node.title: Binjari elder's COVID-19 death mourned as 'deep sadness' spreads across the NT
node.alt: A cloudy sunset sky over a road with a police car with red lights stopped in it.
node.description: The tight-knit Binjari community, near Katherine, mourns the death of a 78-year-old Aboriginal woman who succumbed to health complications related to COVID last night.
node.content:
["The tight-knit Binjari community, near Katherine, is mourning the death of a 78-year-old woman who has died from complications related to COVID-19.", "The Binjari elder, who authorities said had underlying health conditions and was not vaccinated,\u00a0died in hospital last night after contracting the virus two weeks ago as cases spread in the Katherine region.\u00a0", "The woman is the first person to die from coronavirus in\u00a0the\u00a0Northern Territory.\u00a0", "Hard lockdown restrictions in the community of around 200 people were eased slightly yesterday\u00a0but standard lockdown rules remain in place.", "NT Chief Minister Michael Gunner described today as one of great sorrow for the woman's family and community.", "NT Labor senator Malarndirri McCarthy, whose own family members were also affected by the outbreak which currently stands at 60 cases,\u00a0said the woman's death was \"the most dreadful news\".\u00a0", "\"My heart goes out to the all of\u00a0those families,\" she said.", "She said the woman's death showed coronavirus was a \"very real\" threat\u00a0and urged all Territorians to get vaccinated as soon as possible.", "", "
Health staff at Royal Darwin Hospital did \"everything they could\" to save the Binjari woman, Mr Gunner said.(ABC News: Che Chorley)
", "She said authorities must help families in Binjari conduct sorry business\u00a0in an appropriate and safe way.", "\"The first thing for me is to reach out to the families in Binjari and express my sincere condolences and find out what they want,\" she said.\u00a0", "In a post on Twitter, the\u00a0Aboriginal Medical Services Alliance NT said the Binjari woman's death was \"very sad news\".\u00a0", "\"Our thoughts and prayers are with the Binjari mob,\" the post read.\u00a0", "Labor MLA Chansey Paech\u00a0said \"our hearts are so heavy on this sad day \u2014 so, so heavy\".\u00a0", "\"Please, don't wait till this sickness comes to your community to get vaccinated,\" he said in a Twitter post.\u00a0", "Mr Gunner said the clinical team who had been treating the woman\u00a0at RDH was\u00a0\"devastated\".\u00a0", "Health staff had arranged for the woman to say goodbye to her family via FaceTime at the hospital.", "\"We all grieve with them today. All Territorians grieve with them today,\"\u00a0Mr Gunner\u00a0said.\u00a0\u00a0", "The woman's\u00a0infection was linked to the Katherine outbreak, which authorities say was triggered by a\u00a0Cairns woman who had visited Melbourne and\u00a0lied on her border entry form upon entering the Territory.", "NT Police Commissioner Jamie Chalker said police would launch a criminal investigation into \"the\u00a0causation and links that may have been to the passing of this lady\".", "
Authorities reassure remote residents about vaccine supply
", "The first-dose vaccination rate in Binjari is now at 100 per cent.\u00a0", "But before coronavirus entered\u00a0the community, health authorities say the vaccination rate in\u00a0Binjari was low.", "Acting Chief Health Officer Charles Pain said he understood people would be feeling \"anxious about getting vaccinated\" following the woman's death.\u00a0", "\"All of our remote clinics have the vaccine available, [so]\u00a0you should have no concern about the availability,\" he said.", "\"You can just go to any clinic and there will be people there to vaccinate you.", "\"Please be assured if you're anxious about getting vaccinated now, you will have the ability to get vaccinated.\"", "Vaccination rates have lifted across the NT since the start of the outbreak, with Katherine passing the 80 per cent threshold this week.", "", "
Heavily mutated Omicron variant puts scientist on alert
"]
